mainHeading: National University of Singapore - Deep Learning Research Extern
context: Completed a 30-day onsite externship program at NUS, which included deep learning lectures by university professors, a Data Analysis for Big Data session by AWS professionals and a project component focused on deep learning topics.
objectives: Built SAFESCAN, a YOLOv8-based model for detecting safety gear at construction sites, achieving ~80% accuracy on helmets, gloves, and protective clothing.
Developed a real-time monitoring system using Flask, capable of processing live video feeds at 30 fps for safety compliance.
Applied deep learning techniques to solve a practical computer vision task aimed at improving workplace safety.
